author: Zack Budryk
title: States urge citizens to stay at home, businesses to suspend in-person operations
description: Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers (D) and Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) on Monday announced "safer at home" orders for their respective states, while Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker (R) called on all businesses and organiza...
content: Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers (D) and Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) on Monday announced safer at home orders for their respective states, while Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker (R) called on all businesses and organizations providing nonessential services to… [+2041 chars]
